turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what would you like to do today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order three medium pizzas from De La Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so thats 3 medium pizza is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what toppings do you want on your pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one pepperoni pizza, one pineapple pizza, and one meat lovers pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok one second please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: could you repeat you order please?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want one pepperoni pizza, one pineapple pizza, and one meat lover's pizza.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so thats 1 pepperoni, 1 pineapple and 1 meat lovers pizza right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct. I also want thick crust on all of them.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok so that will be 1 pepperoni, 1 pineapple and 1 meat lovers pizza with thick crust is that correct?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok one second while i get your total for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so 3 medium pizza, 1 pepperoni, 1 pineapple and 1 meat lovers pizza with thick crust is comes to 60 dollars.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: wonderful, ur pizza has been ordered at local Bella Luna and will be ready for pick up shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: do you ned anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is all. Thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: have a nice day.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You, too. Goodbye.
